Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Realize the shift of focus and build a powerful country with Four Modernizations" (实现重点转移建设四化强国), this third part (of four) covers "The party and the nation have entered a new period of historical development 1976-1981" (党和国家进入新的历史发展时期 1976-1981).It shows construction of housing; advances in (military) industry; the punitive expedition against Vietnam (February 1979); and the start of the construction of the Three Gorges (三峡) Dam (Gezhouba 葛洲坝).
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Foreign Friends: North VietnamChinese Space Program
